data.name: MGSLeisure1000 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Demo version of our upcoming game Leisure1000.

In this demo you are limited to just bowling in single player.

There is no scoring and still very early in progress.

Why are we then releasing a demo? Feedback, on throwing and the feel.

All items are subject to change in the full version of the game.

We hope you have a bit of fun and once again the Demo does not reflect the final quality of the game.

HOW TO PLAY

Left stick/pad is movement - PLEASE NOTE : The demo only feature locomotion movement currently.

Right trigger on Vive or right grip button on Oculus touch picks up the ball. Release to throw.

Click left stick on Oculus touch or top button on left Vive controller to recentre view.


KNOWN ISSUES & BUGS:

- Ball weight is not enabled in this demo, when the game is released there will be 3 different weighted bowling balls. You will not be able to throw it so far down the lane.

- Lane marking to be added

- Sometimes the pins spin off this has now been fixed in main version.

- Height issues, we have now sorted the player height issue but you may find you appear too tall in the game.

- If you throw your ball into a different lane it will not return and you will have to restart the game.



Please appreciate this is merely just a very small demo with many features disabled which are being worked upon. Currently the bowling in the full game is fully featured but we wanted to give something.
data.about_the_game:
Demo version of our upcoming game Leisure1000.

In this demo you are limited to just bowling in single player.

There is no scoring and still very early in progress.

Why are we then releasing a demo? Feedback, on throwing and the feel.

All items are subject to change in the full version of the game.

We hope you have a bit of fun and once again the Demo does not reflect the final quality of the game.

Right trigger on Vive or right grip button on Oculus touch picks up the ball. Release to throw.

Click left stick on Oculus touch or top button on left Vive controller to recentre view.

data.short_description: Small bowling play on our upcoming game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx970 / AMD R9 290
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: I7 4790k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980ti / AMD R9 290x
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
